mapper.select:
select che.*,pro.id as sys_detail_id, pro.name as name, i.id as inquiry_id from sys_pro_detail pro LEFT JOIN inquiry i on pro.id = i.pro_detail_id LEFT JOIN quote q on i.id = q.inquiry_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_check che on q.id = che.quote_id
q.is_active = 1 and i.is_active = 1 and pro.is_active = 1
and pro.id = #{proDetailId}
ORDER BY time,pro.id

select che.*,pro.id as sys_detail_id, pro.name as name, i.id as inquiry_id, pro.time as pro_time from sys_pro_detail pro LEFT JOIN inquiry i on pro.id = i.pro_detail_id LEFT JOIN quote q on i.id = q.inquiry_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_check che on q.id = che.quote_id
q.is_active = 1 and i.is_active = 1 and pro.is_active = 1
and pro.name = #{proName}
ORDER BY time,pro.id

SELECT spd.id, spd.name, convert(count(if(spc.finally_audit=0 or spc.finally_audit is null,null,true))*100/count(1), decimal(15,2)) `completion` from sys_pro_detail spd LEFT JOIN inquiry i on spd.id = i.pro_detail_id LEFT JOIN quote q on q.inquiry_id = i.id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_check spc on spc.quote_id = q.id where spd.is_active = 1 and (i.is_active = 1 and q.is_active = 1 or i.is_active is null or q.is_active is null) GROUP BY spd.id, spd.name
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
